import Link from 'next/link' import Layout from '../../components/Layout' import {useState} from 'react' import {readJournal} from '../../actions/journal' import {API,APP_NAME,DOMAIN} from '../../config' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' import {withRouter} from 'next/router' //dynamic routing,this url will be journals/:slug //grab router query,make request to backend //adding router object to component const readSingleJournal = ({router}) => { return
{JSON.stringify({router})}
 } export default withRouter(readSingleJournal)
